body:
I suggest the following:

- Put the content of your `Lambda` inside a custom layer (say `MyLayer`)
- Place the `MyLayer` definition in your file
- Call `model_to_estimator` within the following scope:

```python
with tf.keras.utils.CustomObjectScope({'MyLayer': MyLayer}):
   estimator = model_to_estimator(model)
```
